page.title: 08Meppershall 2
page.content:
The population has grown rapidly with new people commuting to jobs in nearby towns. Look at the War Memorial, though, and notice that many names thereon still exist in the village. So, a solid core of old families still linger on.
There is a thriving Play School in the village and a lively Girl Guide troop.
Each year, the village gala provides entertainment with lots of stalls, games and a display of dancing by the village school. The Drama Group puts on shows several times ayear and the November Bonfire has become an annual event.
Each household receives news of events each month via the new village magazine which won an award in 1985.
